snippet: LEVINE--Lillian, 92, of Enfield, CT, on January 17, 2016. Wife of the late Irving, daughter of the late Julius and Minnie Sugarman, mother of Scott, Rabbi Robert, and Sheree, mother-in-law of Alice Geller and Gina (Stahl) Levine, grandmother of Kate, Sarah, William, Judah, Ezra, David and Maya, sister of the late Sidney, Esther, Frieda and Samuel. Favorite aunt and friend of many. Devoted fifth grade teacher for many years in Ludlow, MA, affectionately known as "Lillian Levine the Homework Queen." Much loved and loving. Wise counsel to us all. Courageous in life and in death. Will be incredibly missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Lillian, 92, of Enfield, CT, on January 17, 2016. Wife of the late Irving, daughter of the late Julius and Minnie Sugarman, mother of Scott, Rabbi Robert, and Sheree, mother-in-law of Alice Geller and Gina (Stahl) Levine, grandmother of Kate, Sarah, William, Judah, Ezra, David and Maya, sister of the late Sidney, Esther, Frieda and Samuel. Favorite aunt and friend of many. Devoted fifth grade teacher for many years in Ludlow, MA, affectionately known as "Lillian Levine the Homework Queen." Much loved and loving. Wise counsel to us all. Courageous in life and in death. Will be incredibly missed. 1/3
